prompts: Create a Pokemon that oozes colorful slime and has a mischievous expression.
Design a creature made of toxic waste with a playful personality and a unique color palette.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a gooey, amorphous body.
Imagine a living pile of sludge that can blend into its surroundings effortlessly.
Make a Pokemon that looks like it's made from purple goo and has an intriguing design.
Generate a creature with a round, blob-like shape and a quirky demeanor.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of pollution but still looks cute.

distinctive_features: Large mouth with a tongue sticking out
Eyes positioned high on the body
